# Intro {data-video="top-right"}

- This Quarto extension adds a live video feed from your webcam in your slides. Ensure your webcam is enabled in the browser. You may need to refresh the webpage after enabling the webcam.
- Press [C] to toggle camera!
- Click the video image to switch input.
